explanation: [0-0] On a beach by the sea, with yellow sand, white waves in the distance, and a blue-pink sky.
[0-3] Then the waves surge up and beat on the beach, stirring up white foam. A right leg wearing khaki pants and a right foot wearing sneakers stomp hard in the foam, splashing it around.
